metadata.title: CVE-2021-30848 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved memory handling. Thisissue is fixed in iOS 14.8 and iPadOS 14.8, Safari 15, iOS 15 and iPadOS15. Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to code execution.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-30848` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.32.4-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.32.4-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.32.4-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.32.4-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.32.4-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37-gtk2 - 2.32.4-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.32.4-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkitgtk package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
webkit2gtk package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.32.4-0ubuntu0.18.04.1').
qtwebkit-source package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
